entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Clearing overnight. Snow level 1200 metres. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low plus 2 with risk of frost. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High 13. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the evening. 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Snow level 1100 metres. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
